definition: luteal phase (period in the menstrual cycle when an embryo can implant in the womb)
a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]

sentences.english: A luteal phase defect may also occur.
sentences.chinese: 也可能會出現黃體期不足。

sentences.english: Symptoms should occur in the luteal phase only.
sentences.chinese: 這些症狀只發生在黃體期。

sentences.english: The length of the luteal phase determines the time of ovulation within your menstrual cycle.
sentences.chinese: 黃體期的長度決定了月經週期內排卵的時間。

sentences.english: However, candidiasis tended to occur in the luteal phase of the menstrual cycle.
sentences.chinese: 然而，念珠菌感染傾向於發生在月經週期的黃體期。

sentences.english: Operation in luteal phase benefits to breast cancer patients who were positive for ER or PR.
sentences.chinese: 結論黃體期手術有利於激素依賴型乳腺癌患者預後。

sentences.english: How do I determine the length of my luteal phase?
sentences.chinese: 如何確定黃體期的長短？

sentences.english: I was not there ovulation ah, luteal or inadequate?
sentences.chinese: 黃體期的長度決定了月經週期內排卵的時間。

sentences.english: If you are not sure about the length of your luteal phase, you can assume it is 14 days (the average length for most women).
sentences.chinese: 如果不能確定自己黃體期的長度，可以假定爲14天。
